mapper.select: SELECT h.h_code, h.s_code, h.t_code, h.shop_name, h.image, h.loc, h.hours, h.menu_price, h.comments, h.h_order, s.s_name , t.t_name FROM hotplace h, seoul s, thema t WHERE h.s_code = s.s_code AND h.t_code = t.t_code
select h_code, s_code, t_code, shop_name, image, loc, hours, menu_price, comments, h_order from hotplace where s_code = #{s_code} and t_code = #{t_code} order by h_order asc
mapper.insert: insert into hotplace(h_code, s_code, t_code, shop_name, image, loc, hours, menu_price, comments, h_order) values (NEXTVAL('hot_idx'), #{s_code}, #{t_code}, #{shop_name}, #{image}, #{loc},#{hours},#{menu_price},#{comments},#{h_order})
mapper.select: SELECT h.h_code, h.s_code, h.t_code, h.shop_name, h.image, h.loc, h.hours, h.menu_price, h.comments, h.h_order, s.s_name , t.t_name FROM hotplace h, seoul s, thema t WHERE h.s_code = s.s_code AND h.t_code = t.t_code and h.h_code = #{h_code} order by h_order asc
mapper.update: update hotplace set s_code = #{s_code}, t_code = #{t_code}, shop_name = #{shop_name}, image = #{image}, loc = #{loc}, hours = #{hours}, menu_price = #{menu_price}, comments = #{comments}, h_order = #{h_order} where h_code = #{h_code}
